definitions.definition: The part of the day from noon or lunchtime until sunset, evening, or suppertime or 6pm.
The later part of anything , often with implications of decline .
A party or social event held in the afternoon.

main_definition: The part of the day from noon or lunchtime until sunset, evening, or suppertime or 6pm.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) The later part of anything , often with implications of decline .
( informal ) A party or social event held in the afternoon.
